member.name: T:SoloX.ExpressionTools.Examples.BasicParserExample
member.summary: This class shows how to use the ExpressionParser.

member.name: M:SoloX.ExpressionTools.Examples.BasicParserExample.ParseASimpleLambda
member.summary: Let's parse a self described lambda expression like "(int x) => x + 1".

member.name: M:SoloX.ExpressionTools.Examples.BasicParserExample.ParseASimpleLambdaWithAParameterTypeResolver
member.summary: Let's parse a lambda expression like "x => x + 1" using a IParameterTypeResolver.
